title: Ingame store load too long
body: So i had this problem pretty much since 6.12 and the only way to fix it is to open and reset Internet Explorer options setting, but its temporary, anyone know how to fix this permanently ?

replies.body:
Thre could be other settings affecting the store. We've consolidated a list of the most common fixes for issues with the store that may increase the speed yours comes up. I suggest working through all the steps in our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) as a next step.

Let me know if those changes resolved the issue.
